label: applicableProductCertificate
comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.

rangeIncludes.comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
Material which exhibits adverse effects on living organisms.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
Any materials unused and rejected as unwanted during a production process.
A production material component that is unused and rejected as unwanted.
Any materials unused and rejected as unwanted resulting from transportation.
An unused and rejected as unwanted component of transport material resulting from transportation.
